revised_title: Proton and Fluorine Resonance Spectra Analysis of Para-Fluoro-Aniline
tldr: The authors studied the high-resolution proton and fluorine resonance spectra of para-fluoro-aniline, a complex aromatic compound. They analyzed the chemical shifts and spin-spin coupling constants between the nuclei, providing insights into the molecular structure and behavior of the compound. Their findings contribute to the understanding of nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR) spectroscopy and the study of aromatic compounds.
